div.p: Montana High School Association Executive Director Mark Beckman on April 22 announced there will be no spring high school sports this year.

img.alt: Choteau JH volleyball wraps up seasons

h2.a: Choteau JH volleyball wraps up seasons

div.p: The Choteau junior high volleyball season started with practices on Dec. 16 and ended on Feb. 15 with tournaments for the seventh-grade and eighth-grade teams, both of which won tournament championships.
